definition: myelin sheath (membrane surrounding axon of nerve cell)

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical and neuropathologic characteristics of tumor-like demyelination diseases.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腫瘤樣脫髓鞘病臨牀和病理學特點。

sentences.english: The electron microscope was used to study the histomorphologic changes of myelin sheath in VTA.
sentences.chinese: 應用透射電鏡對各組大鼠VTA的髓鞘進行觀察。

sentences.english: Demyelination and axonal degeneration were confirmed electromicroscopicaly through sural nerve biopsy.
sentences.chinese: 神經活檢證實同時有脫髓鞘和軸索變性。

sentences.english: Without myelin, the signal leaks and dissipates.
sentences.chinese: 沒有髓鞘的話，電訊號就會漏流而消散。

sentences.english: Active foci of demyelination may demonstrate restricted diffusion.
sentences.chinese: 脫髓鞘的活動性的病竈可以顯示爲彌散受限。

sentences.english: The neuropathies in myelin sheath and Nissl body were markedly attenuated in group K.
sentences.chinese: 組髓鞘及尼氏體病變明顯減輕。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical effect of high-dose methylprednisolone pulse therapy on acute demyelinating encephalopathy.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察甲潑尼龍衝擊治療急性脫髓鞘腦病的療效。

sentences.english: The isointense bands represent the white matter which has been spared or has had remyelination.
sentences.chinese: 等信號帶代表剩餘的白質或已經再生的髓鞘。

sentences.english: Multiple sclerosis is a chronic, debilitating disease characterized by multiple areas of focal demyelination throughout the while matter of the central nervous system.
sentences.chinese: 多發性硬化症是一種中樞神經系統白質脫髓鞘的疾病。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical and pathologic characteristics of demyelinating encephalopathy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討脫髓鞘性腦病的臨牀表現與病理特徵。

sentences.english: This paper will mainly illustrate the advance in pathological mechanism of demyelinating canine distemper encephalitis.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了脫髓鞘犬瘟熱腦炎致病機理的研究概況。

sentences.english: Brain biopsy revealed severe damage to the myelin sheath. Question is, why?
sentences.chinese: 腦活檢顯示有嚴重的髓鞘損傷問題是爲什麼會這樣？

sentences.english: Myelination on regenerated nerve fibers was investigated under electronic microscope.
sentences.chinese: 電鏡觀察再生神經纖維的髓鞘形成。

definition: axon (long thin axis of nerve cell)

pinyin: shen2 jing1 jiao1 zhi4 xi4 bao1
